body: 神作確定，700多頁花2個小時看完

Ya’ll dumb lmao. Not even all the girls in the story cheat. Glasses girl is just sex friends(at most) with other guys until the end. Brunette and the girl who also fucked the cheater are the only ones and even then the latter wasn’t really in a proper relationship from what I can tell. Besides, brunette still came out with a loss even if she cheated and was the one who broke up. MC landed with a better girl who ain’t gonna cheat out of curiosity, not to mention she still has to deal with the fact that MC likes glasses girl more despite originally Not liking her. Glasses girl bouncing from liking the first dude, to being liked by the blonde dude, and also liking the MC means she’s got a proper hold of her feelings now
Beautiful story, i love this even this stab my heart 😭😭

FCKN D4NM, the stupidest of this work can compared with the manga Rent a Girlfriend, I don’t know what the artist tried to accomplish with this work (32 chapters for a HentaiDoujin!!!) I feel more insulted reading this than watching the last chapters of Game of Throne’s jajajaja. Art 7/10

I wrote a full summary for those want to know wtf's happening every chapter here:
https://pastebin.com/u/DrinksandDame   Had to post in pastebin cuz it's 32 chapters.
So, it's ended with "happy ending", if my eyes don't betrayed me because I can't read a shit from this.
Lol I became retarded skimming this. Hope they a burn in hades Fire.
depression ntr
This make me want to kill my self
bruh...

WTF that was the stupidest shit ive ever read. Why the hell did she just fuck every guy in their grade just to go bad to the same guy, shes fucking stupid, and the guy just lets it go even after seeing her get fucked by another guy thats the dumdest shit ever

I wish the MC had gotten to fuck the tan short haired girl at least once. I mean she was the reason the black haired girl broke up with him (stupid reason). If that hadn't happened then he wouldnt have had that terrible relationship with the horrible cover girl, and in turn if the MC hadnt been with the cover girl then the black haired girl wouldve never have spent half the beach trip fucking that blonde guy. If the black haired girl hadnt been fucking the blonde guy then the cover girl wouldnt have fucked the tan douche (for no acceptable reason). Then the cover girl breaks up with the MC because shes jealous of the black haired girl, because the MC loves the black haired girl which she has no right to be since she (the cover girl) is a straight up cheating ho, and the MC loves her (the cover girl) too and chose her.

"I like you, so im gonna cheat on you again and again, and then cry about it" pretty much sums up every character in this story. Especially the FMCs they fucking suck. The light brown haird girl (the girl on thr cover) especially - should feel way more fucking guilt than she did. Shes literally the worst. And the Black haired girl who ends up with the MC isnt that much better tbh; her reasons for sleeping with other guys were incredibly stupid but at least they were slightly better than the cover girl's reasons (as well as her taste in men). The cover girl shouldve been crying and desperately apologizing at the end, not saying "its your fault too and Im gonna go fuck this other guy"

starting ofc with them both trying to cheat on eachother, literally just out of nowhere they act like utter retarde cuz author wants cuck whore shit to happen, talk to eachother? noooo instead we're gonna stop talking to eachother and act like we're trying to fuck someone else because we totally like eachother! not like we just wanna fuck anything that walks, its actually an insult to human intelligence that people act like this

skimmed over it again its actually even more retarded
guys cheats on girl so girl almost cheats on guy and proceeds to never talk to eachother then guy cheats on girl again so then both girls cheat on guy then girl realises she really likes the guy she cheated on so SHE CHEATS ON HIM AGAIN CUZ THEY'RE ALL RETARDED SELFCENTERED WHORES WHO CANT COMMUNICATE BUT NEED TO FUCK EVERY COCK THEY CAN YET LIE AND SAY THEY LOVE SOMEONE WHEN THE FIRST THING THEY DO IS CHEAT ON THEM its so utterly retarded but author just wants cuck whore shit to happen so he makes them say one thing and then do the opposite! ''i like you so im gonna cheat on you again then cry about it''

kill everyone of them

just assuming that every girl is a whore whos first reaction is to cheat on their bf instead of talking, like whores do, honestly mc and the fmc deserves it for being utterly mentally ill, anyone who behaves like this in real life deserves a lifetime of suffering <3
I wish I didn’t suck at reading Chinese
can someone give me a quick summary of what happens in all of this cause i dont want to go through 760 pages of untranslated work please and thank you
This is better than those crap ntrs where they just liked the big dick.
I hope dat the mc and the glasses girl are going out, i hope.....

Beacuse I think the gyaru guy talked to her and made her realise the guy she liked (who she was going out with) love another (glasses girl)  so she kind snapped and said fuck it and start banging other guy...but she ditched him in the end leaving the gyaru all alone 

A good coming of age story of the struggle of different people in love with one another and how they handle it 

Good ending as everyone kinda get someone (but curled haired guy who was kinda conned by blond bitch)
幸好有了个好结局。学长真的是里面最好的人了！虽然我吃男女这对cp。但我还是要骂青梅女的真的婊！
